record.description: List of names of those who participated with Enrico Fermi in the December 2, 1942 experiment and who were present for the meeting in Eckhart Hall's common room December 1, 1962. From left to right (in rows so as to identify them in the picture): Mrs. Laura Fermi and Mrs. Betty Compton seated at the front. Row 1: Norman Hilberry, Frank H. Spedding, Theodore Petry Jr., Herbert L Anderson, Walter Zinn, William H. Hinch, George Miller, Warren Nyer and Leo Seren. Row 2: Richard J. Watts, Volney C. Wilson, Philip G. Koontz, William J. Sturm, Leon Sayvetz, and Anthony J. Matz. Row 3: Robert E. Johnson, Wilcox P. Overbeck, Hugh M. Barton, Jr., Harold V. Lichtenberger, August C. Knuth, David P. Rudolph and George D. Monk. Row 4: Robert G. Nobles, Thomas Brill, Carl C. Gamertsfelder, Gerard Pawlicki, Marvin H. Wilkening, W. R. Kanne, Herbert E. Kubitschek, and George M. Maronde.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Separate caption with the archives stamp.
